_sText:
This is the third version of my jail map.

The features of this maps are:

- Minigame
- Climb
- Dodgeball _[new]_
- Soccer
- Race _[new]_
- Swimming Pool
- Healroom
- Camera Monitoring _[new]_

Improved in this version:

- all cells
- soccer room
- shaft
- minigame
- climb

Furthermore there are a few possibilities for the Terrorists to escape. A few of the escape routes are hidden.

Noblock is recommended for this map.

Please notify me if you have any suggestions or ideas for the next version.
